### Meet Dumpling, the Research Whiz!

![](Image/IMG_5546.JPG){fig-align="center" width="400"}

Behold Dumpling: part cat, part research assistant, all fluff. He's huge, he's friendly, and he's probably way smarter than me. Research just got a lot more purr-sonal!
